text_block_list.text:
...Ah!!
I'm so glad, I found you~...!!
I've been wanting to talk to you for ages!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
You know, I really, truly thank you!
That was the main thing I needed to say!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text: Thanks to you, so many people came to the live show... Hehe, it feels like a dream!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text: Falko is an Umadol, so even on my birthday, this was a Birthday Live planned with the idea of giving presents to all the fans, but—
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text: To have such a wonderful stage prepared for me... In the end, it was Falko who ended up receiving the present!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
But now, it's time for me to return the favor!!
Get ready, it's Falko's SERIOUS MOOODE!!
I'm going to make this the ab-so-lutely best Birthday Live ever! With all the effort Falko—who will one day be the Top Umadol—can put forth NOW!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon

text_block_list.text:
You watch from the special seat, too, okay?
Make sure you watch Falko's sparkle!
text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
